Articles.Content:
I am looking to get into making cinematics in KSP. Can I have some tips?

I would also like some tips on using KerbCam to its fullest.

Um... you can use middle mouse to off center your targets and f2 to hide your HUD, make sure you can record your cinematic's at good quality, when rendering the video, 23.97 fps looks the best for cinematic's and movies etc... And just simply be creative!
